aboutPage.aboutUs:
Victor Leather Bags Factory Ltd. is an under construction bag and luggage manufacturing and exporting unit. It is an 1,08,000 sft factory building located at Kuttapara, Sarail, Brahmanbaria, Bangladesh. The products will be backpacks, laptop bags, luggage and ladies handbags which will be manufactured and eventually will be exported to all over the world.

We have gathered vast experience in the sector of bag manufacturing and exporting from our other factories. Gaining successful experience from our other bags businesses, we incorporated Victor Leather Bags Factory in August 2019; but covid started before we started construction of the factory building. After the covid ended, we started the construction of the new factory and hopefully will be able to finish the construction works of the factory building within December 2022 and the factory will be ready for bag and luggage production within April 2023.

We are already linked up with several globally renowned brands and retailers. Our other factories are manufacturing and exporting to North America, Europe and Asia.

More than nine hundred workers will work in the factory of six hundred machinery and will make more than one hundred fifty thousand pieces of bags every month for export.
aboutPage.mdSpeech:
For the last one decade, we have provided the global market with backpack, laptop bags, luggage and ladies handbags maximizing the value for our customers worldwide. For the past several years, we have witnessed consistent growth, achieved a long-term success having faced with many challenging difficult times.

Making bags is our passion and our main focus has always been to gain faith of our customers in terms of quality, timing and pricing. We shall work continuously to provide our customers with service and quality products at a competitive price. We pride ourselves on being the customer’s choice, which is also our mission. When it comes to ethics and integrity there can be no compromises, no excuses.

Victor’s management team is committed to our company’s core values which are behind the success of our group for all these years. We expect the same commitment from our employees and business partners. Integrity, honesty, competency, collaboration, creativity and respect – these values have defined us since the founding of the first company of the group. Our commitment to these ideals must be unwavering. Our vision is to deliver a customer experience second to none.
